1.0.name: wordpress/ballast-security-securing-hashing
1.0.description: This plugin seamlessly changes your stored password hash to a far stronger one. The hash that it is changed to is generated with a variety of variations on PBKDF2, including my own ARC4PBKDF2 which adds custom ARC4 encryption during the hashing processs, then a SHA-1 to meet size constraints. This plugin exponentially increases the strength of your stored password.
